## 2. Your Rights as a Data Subject

You have the following rights under the GDPR:

- Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR)
- Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
- Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten") (Art. 17 GDPR)
- Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
- Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
- Right to object (Art. 21 GDPR)

You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority, especially in the EU Member State of your habitual residence, place of work, or place of the alleged infringement.

## 3. Purpose and Legal Basis of Processing

We do not collect personal data unless it is necessary to provide the website.
